title: Gluware Launches the Industry's First Multi-Vendor, Multi-Domain IT ...
content:
Gluware Launches the Industry’s First Multi-Vendor, Multi-Domain IT Automation and Orchestration Solutions | Business Wire
===============



[![Image 1: Business Wire](https://www.businesswire.com/images/bwlogo_extreme.png)](http://www.businesswire.com/)

  

**Gluware Launches the Industry’s First Multi-Vendor, Multi-Domain IT Automation and Orchestration Solutions**
==============================================================================================================

_Gluware Adds SDN/NFV Proven Expertise, Cyan Blue Planet Co-Founder, Eric Clelland and Team_

August 21, 2017 07:15 AM Eastern Daylight Time 

SACRAMENTO, Calif.--([BUSINESS WIRE](https://www.businesswire.com/))--Today Gluware is making four important announcements:

> @gluwareinc launches first multi-vendor, multi-domain IT automation solutions https://goo.gl/vD2vjy
> 
> [Post this](https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20170821005169/en/Gluware-Launches-the-Industry%E2
summary: Gluware has launched the industry's first multi-vendor, multi-domain IT automation and orchestration solutions. Additionally, the company has added proven expertise in Software-Defined Networking (SDN) and Network Functions Virtualization (NFV) with the inclusion of Cyan Blue Planet Co-Founder, Eric Clelland, and his team. The announcement was made from Sacramento, California on August 21, 2017.

title: Gluware Launches Config ModelingTM to Accelerate Automation of...
content:
SACRAMENTO, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Gluware announced today a major innovation in the Gluware Control automation and orchestration platform enabling an industry first ability to leverage existing device configurations to accelerate automation using its new Config Modeling technology. 
> @gluwareinc enables rapid automation of enterprise brownfield networks using Config Modeling #SDN #Automation 
> 
> [Post this](https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180319005299/en/Gluware-Launches-Config-ModelingTM-to-Accelerate-Automation-of-Brownfield-Enterprise-Networks#) 

Enterprise IT continues to struggle with network automation currently performing most configuration changes and compliance checks manually. Network complexity has slowed automation efforts created by multi-vendor devices deployed over many years, vendor unique syntax and lack of programmatic interfaces. While technologies like SDN and NFV show promise for the future, enterprises must operate and maintain their existing networks in the meantime.
summary: Gluware has introduced a groundbreaking innovation in its Gluware Control automation and orchestration platform called Config Modeling. This new technology accelerates network automation by leveraging existing device configurations, addressing the current struggles of enterprise IT with manual configuration changes and compliance checks. The complexity of multi-vendor networks and lack of programmatic interfaces have hindered previous automation efforts. Gluware’s Config Modeling promises to rapidly automate brownfield networks using existing configurations.

title: Glue Networks Announces That Gluware Addresses the ONUG SD ...
content: Glue Networks Announces That Gluware Addresses the ONUG SD-WAN Working Group Use Case and “Top 10” | Business Wire =============== [![Image 1: Business Wire](https://www.businesswire.com/images/bwlogo_extreme.png)](http://www.businesswire.com/) **Glue Networks Announces That Gluware Addresses the ONUG SD-WAN Working Group Use Case and “Top 10”** ============== Download -------- [![Image 2: Gluware addresses ONUG SD-WAN Top 10 (Graphic: Business Wire)](https://mms.businesswire.com/media/20141029005335/en/438683/4/gluware.jpg?download=1)](https://mms.businesswire.com/media/20141029005335/en/438683/5/gluware.jpg?download=1) Gluware addresses ONUG SD-WAN Top 10 (Graphic: Business Wire) * [![Image 3: Gluware addresses ONUG SD-WAN Top 10 (Graphic: Business Wire)](https://mms.businesswire.com/media/20141029005335/en/438683/4/gluware.jpg)](https://ww
summary: Glue Networks has announced that its software platform, Gluware, addresses the use cases defined by the Open Networking User Group (ONUG) SD-WAN Working Group. Gluware has been recognized as a top solution in the ONUG SD-WAN Top 10 list. This acknowledgment underscores Gluware's capability to meet the stringent requirements and use cases set forth by ONUG, providing robust software-defined wide-area network (SD-WAN) solutions to businesses.

title: Glue Networks to Demonstrate Architecture-Aware WAN Analytics ...
content:
Glue Networks to Demonstrate Architecture-Aware WAN Analytics, Visualization, Verification and Change Management for Software-Defined WAN | Business Wire ===============
 
[![Image 1: Business Wire](https://www.businesswire.com/images/bwlogo_extreme.png)](http://www.businesswire.com/)
 
**Glue Networks to Demonstrate Architecture-Aware WAN Analytics, Visualization, Verification and Change Management for Software-Defined WAN**
=============================================================================================================================================

_**Gluware Orchestration Engine with Analytics Provides Network Automation, QoS and Cisco PfR for the Enterprise WAN**_

Cisco Live US 2014

May 19, 2014 08:05 AM Eastern Daylight Time 

SAN FRANCISCO--([BUSINESS WIRE](https://www.businesswire.com/))--**Today at Cisco Live, Cisco’s annual IT and communications conference,** Glue Networks™ will demonstrate Gluware® with WAN analyti
summary: Glue Networks announced that it will showcase its Gluware Orchestration Engine at Cisco Live US 2014. The platform offers architecture-aware WAN analytics, visualization, verification, and change management for Software-Defined Wide Area Networks (SD-WAN). The engine provides tools for network automation, Quality of Service (QoS), and Cisco's Performance Routing (PfR), aimed at enhancing enterprise WAN management.

title: Glue Networks Delivers Unmatched Agility and Cuts Provisioning Time to Minutes for Software-Defined WANs
content:
Glue Networks Delivers Unmatched Agility and Cuts Provisioning Time to Minutes for Software-Defined WANs | Business Wire ===============

[![Image 1: Business Wire](https://www.businesswire.com/images/bwlogo_extreme.png)](http://www.businesswire.com/)



Glue Networks Delivers Unmatched Agility and Cuts Provisioning Time to Minutes for Software-Defined WANs ============================================================================================================

New Java-Based Deployment Engine Supports DMVPN IKEv2 and MPLS

ONUG Fall 2013

October 30, 2013 01:33 PM Eastern Daylight Time

NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--ONUG Fall 2103–Glue Networks announced general availability of Gluware for Hyb
summary: Glue Networks has announced the general availability of Gluware, their new Java-based deployment engine that supports DMVPN IKEv2 and MPLS, at the ONUG Fall 2013 event. This solution provides unmatched agility and significantly reduces provisioning times for software-defined WANs to just minutes.

title: Glue Networks a Gartner Cool Vendor | Business Wire
content:
Glue Networks a Gartner Cool Vendor | Business Wire =============== 

[![Image 1: Business Wire](https://www.businesswire.com/images/bwlogo_extreme.png)](http://www.businesswire.com/)

**Glue Networks a Gartner Cool Vendor**
=======================================

May 06, 2013 08:15 AM Eastern Daylight Time 

SACRAMENTO, Calif.--([BUSINESS WIRE](https://www.businesswire.com/))--[Glue Networks, Inc.](http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.gluenetworks.com%2F&esheet=50625511&lan=en-US&anchor=Glue+Networks%2C+Inc.&index=1&md5=b2fbdf289b3e35b77f0d11541b3df8af), developer and provider of the world’s most advanced software defined Wide Area Network automation platform, has been designated a [Gartner Cool Vendor for 2013](http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.gluenetworks.com%2Fcool-vendor&esheet=50625511&lan=en-US&anchor=Gartner+Cool+Vendor+for+2013&index=2&md5=3aea003c270c7138474988ef627
summary: Glue Networks, Inc. has been recognized as a Gartner Cool Vendor for 2013. The company is known for developing and providing the world's most advanced software-defined Wide Area Network (WAN) automation platform.

title: Glue Networks Raises $12.4M to Scale Growing Wide Area ...
content:
Glue Networks Raises $12.4M to Scale Growing Wide Area Software-Defined Networking Market | Business Wire =============== 
                                          
 
[![Image 1: Business Wire](https://www.businesswire.com/images/bwlogo_extreme.png)](http://www.businesswire.com/) 
  

**Glue Networks Raises $12.4M to Scale Growing Wide Area Software-Defined Networking Market**
=============================================================================================
  
 
**Automating Branch WAN Among Top 3 SDN Use Cases**
 
Download
--------
 
[![Image 2: Jeff Gray, CEO, and Olivier Huyhn Van, CTO, founded Glue Networks in 2007 to bring cloud-based network automation to the WAN market. With strong partnerships in place and deployed products in production networks since the beginning of 2011, Glue Networks has raised $12.4M to accelerate their business to meet the growing demand for their Gluware intelligent orchestration engine. (Photo: Business Wire)](https://mms.businesswire.com/med
summary: Glue Networks, founded in 2007 by Jeff Gray and Olivier Huyhn Van, has raised $12.4 million to expand its presence in the growing Wide Area Software-Defined Networking (SDN) market. The company aims to automate Branch WAN, which is among the top three SDN use cases. Since 2011, Glue Networks has had strong partnerships and deployed products in production networks. The funding will be used to accelerate their business to meet the growing demand for their Gluware intelligent orchestration engine.

title: Glue Networks Announces Partnership Agreement with World Wide ...
content:
Glue Networks Announces Partnership Agreement with World Wide Technology | Business Wire
===============
                                         

[![Image 1: Business Wire](https://www.businesswire.com/images/bwlogo_extreme.png)](http://www.businesswire.com/)

  

**Glue Networks Announces Partnership Agreement with World Wide Technology**
============================================================================

July 12, 2011 12:15 PM Eastern Daylight Time 

SACRAMENTO, Calif.--([BUSINESS WIRE](https://www.businesswire.com/))--[Glue Networks, Inc](http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.gluenetworks.com%2F&esheet=6790038&lan=en-US&anchor=Glue+Networks%2C+Inc&index=1&md5=debcec566b1f523efdb871bcb356c84e)., developer and provider of the world’s first enterprise-grade cloud networking service, today announced that it has entered into a partnership agreement with St. Louis-based [World Wide Technology, Inc.](http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&u
summary: Glue Networks, Inc., a leading developer and provider of enterprise-grade cloud networking services, has announced a partnership agreement with World Wide Technology, Inc., a prominent technology service provider based in St. Louis. This collaboration aims to enhance and expand cloud networking solutions for businesses.

title: Glue Networks Demonstrates Cisco Virtual Office-as-a-Service
content: Glue Networks Demonstrates Cisco Virtual Office-as-a-Service | Business Wire =============== [![Image 1: Business Wire](https://www.businesswire.com/images/bwlogo_extreme.png)](http://www.businesswire.com/) **Glue Networks Demonstrates Cisco Virtual Office-as-a-Service** ================================================================= Interop Las Vegas 2012 Geek Day April 09, 2012 04:26 PM Eastern Daylight Time SACRAMENTO, Calif.--([BUSINESS WIRE](https://www.businesswire.com/))--[Glue Networks, Inc](http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.gluenetworks.com%2F&esheet=50232519&lan=en-US&anchor=Glue+Networks%2C+Inc&index=1&md5=218d0f90f645116638bc3458821fc070)., developer and provider of the world’s first enterprise-grade cloud networking service, today announced that it is highlighting [Cisco® Virtual Office-as-a-Service](http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.gluenetworks.com%2F
summary: Glue Networks, Inc., a provider of enterprise-grade cloud networking services, has announced the highlighting of Cisco Virtual Office-as-a-Service at Interop Las Vegas 2012. The service aims to offer enterprise-level networking solutions in a cloud-based format.

title: Glue Networks Hires Former Intel CIO | Business Wire
content:
Glue Networks Hires Former Intel CIO | Business Wire
===============

                                         

[![Image 1: Business Wire](https://www.businesswire.com/images/bwlogo_extreme.png)](http://www.businesswire.com/)

  

**Glue Networks Hires Former Intel CIO**
========================================

December 18, 2012 08:12 AM Eastern Standard Time 

SACRAMENTO, Calif.--([BUSINESS WIRE](https://www.businesswire.com/))--[Glue Networks, Inc.](http://cts.businesswire.com/ct/CT?id=smartlink&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.gluenetworks.com%2F&esheet=50510890&lan=en-US&anchor=Glue+Networks%2C+Inc.&index=1&md5=f01ec522373fab32a25a99035edbf3b1), developer and provider of the world’s most advanced software defined network (SDN) automation platform, today announced that it has appointed John ‘JJ’ Johnson, former Intel CIO as Executive Director.

> “We are delighted to entice a Silicon Valley luminary out of retirement to be part of our team, helping to set strategic direction for Glue Networks
summary: Glue Networks, Inc., a leading developer of software defined network (SDN) automation platforms, has appointed John ‘JJ’ Johnson, former Intel CIO, as Executive Director. This move is aimed at leveraging Johnson's expertise to set strategic direction for the company's future growth and innovation.
